name: WHYCOMP004: Score
h4: Winning tracks will be released on "WHYCOMP004: Score", set to release in February 2021
rules: 2. If you use samples, they must be royalty free
3. You cannot use "score" in your track title, as it is in the album name
4. We will provide a graphical score that you can create your audio file to. Be sure to view the resources to understand what it is and how you can use the one we provide

5. Your song should be your interpretation of what the score should sound like. If your song does not sounds like it goes along with the graphical score, it will not be considered in the final picks for the album.

6. Title your track __i__"artist name - track name.wav"__i__, stylized correctly. If you are unable to do that due to character choice, please type your correctly stylized artist and/or song name in the body of your submission email.
7. Please render your file properly. It should be a downloadable __b__16 bit 44.1Khz wav file__b__.
8. Submit your final track mixed and mastered to __email__.
recommendations: Genre of music does not matter for this album
Collabs are good ways to make new friends and make cool sounds! Visit our discord to chat with other artists!
We will be creating visualizers for each song based on the length of time of your song. The video representation of the score will be sped up or slowed down to match the length of your audio file.
